website_summaries.verdict: One of the few fuel filters specifically designed for small engine use. Great buy for lawn mower engines.
pros: Designed specifically for common fuels used on small engines
Will extend the life of common yard and construction equipment without requiring extra routine maintenance
cons: Limited to small engines found on yard and construction equipment

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me!
customer_reviews.text: I attempted to install on my John Deere Model LA135. The inlets on both ends were to short. The gas lines on my LA135 were to large to secure on the fuel filter. Yes, it leaked. I could have changed the one end but not the main line that went to gas tank. The cost of the filter was great if it worked. This fuel filter just did not work for me. I am sure it is a good filter, not for my John Deere LA135. So, i am out the cost of the filter! Guess I won't try to cut corners next time.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara D.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great as expected
customer_reviews.text: Used to do complete tune up on my Husqvarna LG2654 lawn tractor. Orig wanted mulching blade 3 pack but couldn't find on amazon so went with these. Changed blades, drive belt, mower belt, oil, oil filter, spark plugs, fuel filter and air filter. Bought everything except belts, which I had bought a couple of years ago, on amazon. Everything fit perfect like OEM. Most importantly after taking everything apart and putting it back together no leftover parts and the mower still worked and drove around!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nandan R. Hichkad

customer_reviews.title: Junk filter
customer_reviews.text: I thought the OEM part would outperform the generic filter. The filter I received was leaking air into the engine and caused engine misfired.
customer_reviews.author: Prime.CH

customer_reviews.title: hmm
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this filter which is model number 5065h which states it filters to 60 microns, i recieved model number 5065 which says on the box it filters to 40 microns. im not complaining that i got a better filter i just hope it doesnt restrict the flow or anything, im not sure on how low the micron rating can go on an engine with a fuel pump before it causes problems but its a genuine briggs part so i hope it works fine. also my filter is crystal clear while the one pictured is see through white.
customer_reviews.author: TheLoneWolf

customer_reviews.title: I have to believe it is working....
customer_reviews.text: This is a tough thing to review. My lawnmower is running, and it is running well, so I have to believe this is working as it should. It gets 5 stars because of the price and overall value. But I didn't do any great scientific studies or anything. Just know that it seems to work perfectly and is a great value. And really, you ought to change these little boogers every once in awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Telford

customer_reviews.title: Different size?
customer_reviews.text: While this is probably a fine filter, it is shorter in length then the filter that came with my B&S engine. This forced me to either stretch the fuel line to try to make it fit or replace a section of fuel line. Since I had some fuel line on hand, I choose the latter. Might not be a problem depending on the amount of slack in your fuel line but it was with my engine (B&S 22HP twin).
customer_reviews.author: Earl Duke

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: does wha it does. no problem exact fit.for what i relplaced at less the cost of the oem
customer_reviews.author: Bill W.

customer_reviews.title: Family History
customer_reviews.text: This is my family. I knew some of the generations but it goes back farther. It is sourced very well. The lay out of the genealogy is done very well.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I don't waste my time buying the generic stuff. You only have to change this once a year so what are you really saving? I do think it is cheaper if you buy everything as a "kit"
customer_reviews.author: CLR

customer_reviews.title: Good Price
customer_reviews.text: the fuel has been filtered. good replacement for your mower fuel line
customer_reviews.author: Shotgundan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Item looks a bit different than the one online but it was still a perfect fit. It must be the lates and greatest version I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Gia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my riding mower
customer_reviews.text: As described n fast shipping. Perfect fit for my riding mower.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tee

customer_reviews.title: works for me
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit, appears to be better than the original on my tractor, and only took a few seconds to replace
customer_reviews.author: R Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my Troy-Bilt and I had some debris in my tank and it did a great job filtering those particles out.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Robinson
